definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to obey/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing wood and wind/☴/ancient Chinese compass point: 135° (southeast)
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to be chosen/to be elected as
to take part in an election/to run for office
to choose for some purpose/to select and use

sentences.english: You may vote who sever side you like.
sentences.chinese: 你可以投票選你喜歡的任一方。

sentences.english: The clothes designer chose several models to try on his newly designed clothes.
sentences.chinese: 服裝設計師選了幾個模特來試穿他新設計的服裝。

sentences.english: We chose a low sofa that does not block the views.
sentences.chinese: 我們選了一個很矮的沙發，不會擋住風景。

sentences.english: We make the retired official our head of the club.
sentences.chinese: 我們選退休的那位幹部來當俱樂部的主任。

sentences.english: We elected her captain of our basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 我們選她當籃球隊隊長。

sentences.english: It was designated a world heritage site by UNESCO in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，聯合國科教文組織將它選爲世界遺產。

sentences.english: No wonder we feel sick at the thought of choosing just one.
sentences.chinese: 要從中選一種三明治，難怪會讓人覺得頭疼。

sentences.english: She advises keeping small talk finely tuned and topical.
sentences.chinese: 她建議閒聊時要定好調子選好話題。

sentences.english: The font tag has two required attributes and one optional one. They map directly to the three parameters in the java.awt.Font class
sentences.chinese: font標籤有兩個必需的屬性和一個可選屬性。

sentences.english: The city picked the site for the new museum.
sentences.chinese: 該市選這個地方來建新博物館。

sentences.english: You chose that because you want to frighten me.
sentences.chinese: 你選了那個數字是因爲你想要嚇我。

sentences.english: You can put pig's belly or lean meat in the steamed sandwich, which can beat McDonald's Big Mac.
sentences.chinese: 割包可以選五花肉或瘦肉，中國的漢堡不輸麥當勞。

sentences.english: If at all possible, choose a room with a great east facing window.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的話，就選一間窗朝東向的房間。

sentences.english: The status line is another optional component of an application window.
sentences.chinese: 狀態行是應用程序窗口的另一個可選組件。

sentences.english: I can't make up my mind between these two dishes.
sentences.chinese: 這兩道菜到底選哪一道，我拿不定主意。

definition: to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
